_instructions: Copy this to config.json and adjust values as needed

simulation._duration_days: Number of days to simulate (30 = 1 month)
simulation._time_step_minutes: Simulation time step in minutes (60 = hourly)
simulation._start_date: Starting date (YYYY-MM-DD). Affects sun angle and daylight
simulation._season: Season for cloud coverage: spring, summer, fall, winter
simulation._random_seed: Integer for reproducible results. Set to null for random behavior every run

battery._unit_capacity_kwh: Capacity per battery unit (13.5 = Tesla Powerwall equivalent)
battery._count: Number of battery units (Total Capacity = unit_capacity * count)
battery._efficiency: Round-trip efficiency (0.9 = 90%, energy lost as heat)
battery._min_soc: Minimum state of charge in % (protection against deep discharge)

solar._unit_peak_power_kw: Peak power per unit (5.0 kW = ~12 panels)
solar._count: Number of solar arrays. TIP: Increase to 2 or 3 if you have high energy deficit

inverter._unit_max_output_kw: Maximum output per inverter unit (clips excess solar)

load._peak_hours_max_kw: Maximum added load during peak hours

grid._import_cost_per_kwh: Cost to import energy from grid ($/kWh)
grid._export_revenue_per_kwh: Revenue from exporting energy to grid ($/kWh)
grid._export_limit_kw: Max POWER flow (pipe size) allowed to grid. NOT a daily quantity limit
